memberdef.type: std::vector< spp::sparse_hash_map< std::vector< uint8_t >, std::vector< uint32_t >, SimpleHash > >
memberdef.name: hashtables_

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int d=128, unsigned int l=8, bool store=true, bool file_backed=false)
memberdef.name: LSHForest

briefdescription.para: Construct a new LSHForest object.

parameterdescription.para: The dimensionality of the MinHashes to be added to this LSHForest.
The number of prefix trees used.
Whether or not to store the data for later enhanced (using parameter kc) retrievel.
Whether to store the data on disk rather than in RAM (experimental).

briefdescription.para: Destroy the LSHForest object.
Add a MinHash to this LSHForest instance.

parameterdescription.para: A MinHash vector.

briefdescription.para: Add Minhashes to this LSHForest (parallelized).

parameterdescription.para: A vector containing MinHash vectors.

briefdescription.para: Create the index (trees).
Check whether the added MinHashes have been indexed.
Write / serialize the current LSH forest to the disk.

parameterdescription.para: The location where the LSH forest should be stored on disk.

briefdescription.para: Read / deserialize a LSH forest instance form the disk. The forest is indexed automatically.

parameterdescription.para: The location from where to load the LSH forest.

briefdescription.para: Get the MinHash of an entry at a given index. The index is defined by order of insertion.

parameterdescription.para: The index (order of insertion) of a entry.

simplesect.para: std::vector<uint32_t> The MinHash associated with an index.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< uint32_t > &from, std::vector< uint32_t > &to, std::vector< float > &weight, unsigned int k, unsigned int kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: GetKNNGraph

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbor graph of the data stored in this LSH forest instance. It will be written to out parameters as an edge list.

parameterdescription.para: A vector to which the from vertices will be written.
A vector to which the to vertices will be written.
A vector to which the float weights of the edges will be written.
The degree of the nearest neighbor graph.

The scalar by which k is multiplied before querying the LSH forest. The results are then ordered decreasing based on linear-scan distances and the top k results are picked to create the k-nearest neighbor graph.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< uint32_t > &vec, unsigned int k, unsigned int kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: QueryLinearScan

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of a query.

parameterdescription.para: The query MinHash.
The number of k-nearest neighbors to return.
The scalar by which k is multiplied before querying the LSH forest. The results are then ordered decreasing based on linear-scan distances and the top k results returned.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

simplesect.para: std::vector<std::pair<float, uint32_t>> The distances and indices of the k-nearest neighbors.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< uint32_t > &vec, unsigned int k, std::vector< uint32_t > &exclude, unsigned int kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: QueryLinearScanExclude

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of a query except those defined in the argument exclude.

parameterdescription.para: The query MinHash.
The number of k-nearest neighbors to return.
A list of indices to be excluded from the search
The scalar by which k is multiplied before querying the LSH forest. The results are then ordered decreasing based on linear-scan distances and the top k results returned.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t id, unsigned int k, unsigned int kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: QueryLinearScanById

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of an entry.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the query entry.
The number of k-nearest neighbors to return.
The scalar by which k is multiplied before querying the LSH forest. The results are then ordered decreasing based on linear-scan distances and the top k results returned.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

simplesect.para: std::vector<std::pair<float, uint32_t>> The distances and indices of the k-nearest neighbors.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t id, unsigned int k, std::vector< uint32_t > &exclude, unsigned int kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: QueryLinearScanExcludeById

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of an entry except those defined in the argument exclude.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the query entry.
The number of k-nearest neighbors to return.
A list of indices to be excluded from the search.
The scalar by which k is multiplied before querying the LSH forest. The results are then ordered decreasing based on linear-scan distances and the top k results returned.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

simplesect.para: std::vector<std::pair<float, uint32_t>> The distances and indices of the k-nearest neighbors.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< uint32_t > &vec, std::vector< uint32_t > &indices, unsigned int k=0, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: LinearScan

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of a query using linear scan.

parameterdescription.para: The query MinHash.
A list of indices to on which to run the linear scan.
The number of k-nearest neighbors to return.
Whether the MinHashes contained within this instance of an LSH forest are weighted.

simplesect.para: std::vector<std::pair<float, uint32_t>> The distances and indices of the k-nearest neighbors.

briefdescription.para: Query the LSH forest for k-nearest neighbors.

briefdescription.para: Get the k-nearest neighbors of all LSH forest entries.
